Get WNBA Stats API Team Player Dashboard

Source: R/wnba_stats_team.R
tp.Rd

Get WNBA Stats API Team Player Dashboard

Get WNBA Stats API Team Player Dashboard

Usage

wnba_teamplayerdashboard(
  date_from = "",
  date_to = "",
  game_segment = "",
  last_n_games = 0,
  league_id = "10",
  location = "",
  measure_type = "Base",
  month = 0,
  opponent_team_id = 0,
  outcome = "",
  pace_adjust = "N",
  plus_minus = "N",
  po_round = "",
  per_mode = "Totals",
  period = 0,
  rank = "N",
  season = "2022",
  season_segment = "",
  season_type = "Regular Season",
  shot_clock_range = "",
  team_id = "1611661317",
  vs_conference = "",
  vs_division = "",
  ...
)

Additional arguments passed to an underlying function like httr.

Value

Return a named list of data frames: PlayersSeasonTotals, TeamOverall
